reviewText: While I LOVE The final Season, I was excited to find this doc on the team.  But, it's only 27 minutes long!!  This should have been stated in the description. Way too short  could have been great. The special feature on the movie was longer and better. Not worth buying, just buy the movie and love it.
We really enjoy watching this. Since we have met the coach and been to this town several times it feels like we know some of these people and it's almost like going home every time we go there.
